message: Late that night, I slip out of my room.
I get myself dressed, put Ren in my bag, and leave my room as quietly as possible.
I pause in the hall and glance at Mink's room. I have to make sure he doesn't hear me.
Where will I go? What will I do? I haven't given it any thought.
I just need to get away from this place.
Stilling my breath, I proceed through the living room and down the stairs.
All I can hear is the faint sound of the air conditioner.
I look back up at the second floor just to be sure, but there's no sign of Mink.
...I'm in the clear.
I feel anxious, impatient, and lost, but I force myself through the front door.
After I gently close the door behind me, I let out a soft sigh.
I've made it this far. Now I just need a place to hide.
I head straight for an alley, avoiding the main street.
I open a map on my Coil as I walk. I want to keep to the outskirts of town as best I can.
All sorts of stuff is going through my mind.
Mink will come looking. I'll have to stay ahead, and I'll have to get to Toue by myself.
Though I don't want to use it... maybe Scrap could help?
I also have to uninstall that program Mink made me put on Ren.
...I hear the flapping of wings.
Looking up, I see a bird fly overhead.
...Couldn't be. I'm just being paranoid.
It's just a bird. A regular old bird.
...No such luck.
The flapping is back.
I look up again and gasp.
A cockatoo with plumage of brilliant colors soars gracefully through the air toward me.
...He found me.
I run for my life, driven by fear.
The map is forgotten. I don't care where I'm going, as long as it's far away.
I take a turn down a random alley, not knowing where it will lead.
But the sound of flapping wings still follows me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Haa, hah...!"
Halfway down the alley, I skid to a stop.
I'm so out of breath I can't even speak. I hunch over, supporting myself on my knees with both hands.
All the while, my mind is completely focused on what's in front of me.
